TEXT.English: [H1]Version 4.0[\H1][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Added this [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Intro Section[COLOR_REVERT] for Modders to introduce their mods to new players.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]No longer display buildings without relevant data in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Building Chart.[COLOR_REVERT]
